website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly popular option, renowned for its excellent quality and long-lasting durability. Ideal for both sandwiches and snacks.
pros: Sealed seams prevent leaks and keep contents protected from moisture
Constructed of FDA approved food safe materials
Zipper closure is easy to handle
Comes in multiple sizes, prints, and colors
cons: Some think the inner lining is stiff, making it somewhat difficult to turn inside out for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a pain to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd type of reusable bag that I've tried. The Bumkins and JaqJaqBird bags are the ones I like best compared to this one. This has a very stiff and bulky inside layer of plastic surrounded by a cloth exterior. They are not easy to turn inside out to clean. It takes way too much effort to clean out the inside corners if you're using this for food. I could fit 2 small sandwiches in it, but I think I'll be using this for something other than food from now on. This isn't the same construction as the Planetwise wet bags that you'd use for cloth diapering.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Great for Preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for preschool lunches and have used them without any issue for nearly a year. My 3 year old has been able to use them on her own and we've taken them to the beach, in the car, to the park, and even stashed them in our bike baskets. The quality of Planet Wise bags is very apparent and we've recommended these bags to many friends. Note: we hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: On Being Green - Very Happy With These Reusable Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to make a little difference - good quality and constructed well. Compared to similar, pricing was reasonable; seemed to have high customer stars/comments, and there were many colors and there are many designs to choose from. I purchased 2 sandwich and 2 snack size to alternate through the week. My 15-yo daughter likes using them. They are much less bulky than Tupperware/Rubbermaid type containers, so better for school/backpack. I’m glad I purchase. Only unknown - how well holds up in the wash; however, rinsing and drying them so far, seem easy and works. Will likely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: FBO

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and clean, fun patterns
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted to replace using disposable zipper bags in my son's lunch EVERY DAY. I've used the small size and the larger one both- for slices of cold meat, cheese, various fruits. I will say that I continue to use a plastic container with a lid for things like crackers, pretzels etc - mostly because it keeps them from getting crushed, plus I suppose it's more airtight and keeps them crunchy. But these bags are great, so glad I have them. I feel very gratified, thinking of all the plastic bags I WON'T be sending to the landfill during my son's school years!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small snack for my Kindergardener. Aside from the adorable design, this bag is easy to clean, easy for my 5 year old to open and close, and the lining is light and not to "crunchy". I have used it for grapes, goldfish, orange slices, carrots and celery, and the occasional cookie! Highly recommend and will be buying more of this brand in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandwich bag
customer_reviews.text: This has a cute cat pattern on the outside. The outside material is washable fabric . The inside is very easy to wash. It has rounded corners on the inside and I am able to get out all the crumbs. I handwash and leave inside out over night to dry. It seems to be well made. We have not had any problems with the zipper. My daughter loves using this sandwich bag in her lunch.
customer_reviews.author: AGYG

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute and I love that it's reusable
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I pack. I put my tweezers and fingernail clippers and tiny items that I don't want loose in my toiletry bag in it. I used to use a zip lock baggy but they get holes in them. It's super cute and I love that it's reusable. I just washed it on the delicate cycle in my washing machine and let it air dry. I haven't tried it for snack yet, but I bet it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great designs and durability!  Pays for itself in a month!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I don’t buy bags to throw away anymore! I’ve saved money because I can use this all year for lunches for my child and trips to the zoo or snacks at the park! I’m helping the environment with less garbage and my child loves picking out the bag for his snack and his lunch! It pays for itself within a month of lunches/ snacks
customer_reviews.author: Tbergie

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! I don't use it for food
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I don't use it for food, I use it for my sons cars. He loves his cars and I always had to carry a handful around with me in the diaper bag. His cars are now in this, so when we go somewhere I don't have to fish around for them...I just pull the bag out and hand them over! * Just for reference, he can manage to stuff about 7 Hot Wheels in this bag and zip it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea For Snacks For Little Ones/Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item and it is great for snacks, and being on the go. It’s clean for little ones and helps on not making huge messes and they can open these little snack bags on their own. They clean well, great price, quality, and saves on plastic bags. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: The lining deteriorated after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. After a few uses we noticed holes in the inner lining though. I wasn't thrilled that the lining was plastic to begin with. I have another brand with a cloth-like lining that I've had for SEVEN YEARS without any deterioration. I used these for a couple months. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Schiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bag!
customer_reviews.text: The only reusable bags I've purchased until now are the Itzy Ritzy bags, which we love. We needed a few more and these were a little cheaper, so I thought I'd give them a shot. First impressions are that the designs are cute and they are about the same size as the Itzy Ritzy ones (I think the Itzy Ritzys are about 1/2 longer), but the lining is much thinner and stiffer. This could be a good thing - not as floppy, so sandwiches may be easier to get in and out? I'll be interested to see if they hold up as well as the others long term.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I’ve been looking for a reusable snack bag for a while when I stumbled upon these. Purchased two for both kids. It holds a mini water bottle or juice box and small snack. My Kindergartener said that all the kids now want one just like his.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking sandwich bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking sandwich bag, very convenient and I love the fact that it is reusable. You can fit a normal sized sandwich in it and it helps me save space as I can just put this in my purse and I don't have to carry a separate lunch bag. It is lightweight and easily washable. This product will help prevent the use of disposable paper sandwich bags (which need to be discarded after a single use) and is thus environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Prema Radhakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: I love using this little zipper bag for my snacks! Easy to clean and holds a good amount! When I ordered I did think it cam with two bags for the price~ but I guess in the long run it helps the environment and saves on plastic bags!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It’s funny to see people’s reaction when they see me eating from this bag - they give me a very confused look as to why I’m eating from a pencil case. At first, I was very concerned that the outer layer was cloth, but it’s thin enough that it dries quickly and soap can penetrate it well for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: James K Inamasu

customer_reviews.title: Warps slightly but otherwise is a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag but had to give it three stars because the inside lining warped with one hand wash in mildly warm water. It’s still usable but isn’t totally flat like when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Haynes

customer_reviews.title: We love this snack bag
customer_reviews.text: We love this snack bag! It is a smaller size, but for a younger child it holds the perfect amount for packing lunches or a snack in the car. We've used it for a variety of items, and so far it has always cleaned out well without any lingering stains or odors. We use this item daily and it still looks and functions like it did the day we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennia

customer_reviews.title: Great for school lunch!
customer_reviews.text: these just arrived and are perfect for my girls' school lunches. They are cute and look durable. Great size for chips without crushing them, though, obviously, they are soft so they don't offer protection if squooshed among harder lunch containers. I just put them on top. Worth the couple extra dollars to buy a great American made eco friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: On a quest to reduce the plastic in my life, I’m gradually collecting alternatives. This is nice quality. I’ve only had it for a month or so but is holding up well to near-daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bang for your buck. IT has two layers and is great for damp snacks too like washes grapes or carrot sticks. Note that its bigger than the bumpkins bags and bumpkin bags are really thin and only for dry snacks, so this is MUCH more useful for the same price! 6.95. I am very critical of everything, and these bags get my full approval.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Muehllehner

customer_reviews.title: Not Leak Proof, but great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I'm trying some other bags that are less expensive, but this one was the best out of the first round of baggies tested. Note that they are not leak proof. My son's Annies snack mix does get stale after about a 5 days zipped. Liquid will leak out. However, they work awesome to take snacks and sandwiches. Easy to wash and cute design. UPDATE: Over 7 months and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: K_toku

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack bags for school!
customer_reviews.text: My special needs son needs snack bags for school, and I love not having to waste Ziplocks every day. These are easy to identify and keep track of at school, and they are returned to me and washed for re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST reusable bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags for my kids lunches! This is the second one I’ve ordered. The prints are cool and the bags are big enough for a sandwich. You won’t be disappointed with this reusable bag!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael L Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very Good.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy enough for a sandwich. My son prefers it for snacks instead though. Needs a few hours to dry all the way so wash it the night before! :)
customer_reviews.author: cattaco

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: This bag has held up well after multiple washes. I'm impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Olson

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different kinds of these bags. So far the zipper has held up and it's been easy to clean. However, people should be aware that whether you use these bags or others, they are not leakproof because of the zipper and crackers will go stale over time. These bags are great for lunches and storing veggies in the fridge for the week, they are not meant for long term storage of food products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Granola Girl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My kids use these for their lunches. Easy to clean and way better than using plastic sandwich bags every day!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBumYarnCo.

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for a reusable sandwich/snack bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is fine but it is not waterproof at the zipper. I didn't really expect it would be but for some reason I thought it was. The bag has only ever been washed by hand and the outer fabric has shrunk. It's still very much usable but it's just different than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barden

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and I feel better about not filling ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, and I feel better about not filling landfills with plastic bags. This rinses clean easily and I haven't noticed any sort of weird taste or anything. It has definitely been worth the investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Waller

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Easy to clean and I feel so much better not throwing away plastic bags all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great! We use so many less plastic bags after ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We use so many less plastic bags after getting these. Had some for years and they keep on working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags as a replacement for plastic sandwich bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags as a replacement for plastic sandwich bags. These are easier to clean than others I have purchased because they are fully lined in plastic even though the outside is cloth. Also, the zipper makes me feel like the contents are more secure and won't spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! I am huge fan of reusable bags and I love the print on this. They are easy to clean too, I usually just run mine through the dishwasher. My daughter loves them because they are "super cute" and all her friends like them. Husband probably wishes I had ordered more man friendly prints, but they serve their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Karwatske

customer_reviews.title: Definitely made well. Haven't used it a lot, ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made well. Haven't used it a lot, but the quality of the Planet Wise bag vs. the Bumkins is obvious. The Planet Wise is double layered, which does take longer drying. And it takes up less room in a lunch box that re-usable containers.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vejvoda

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags and use them daily for lunch. My kids also like them for snacks. Very pretty, handy, and eco-friendly friendly! They're sturdy and I've never had a problem with zippers. I wash them in the sink with dish soap and they've held up well!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich does not dry out!
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are the reason I buy these bags, never disappoint. My grandkids have used this brand for years.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandwich Bag Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of seeing plastic being thrown in the garbage. I bought these to replace anything that would go in one and they have stood up very well.
customer_reviews.author: carlski

customer_reviews.title: I instanly fell in love. I have already bought 2 more and plan ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to try and reduse the number of plastic baggies I was going through. I instanly fell in love. I have already bought 2 more and plan to contuine growing my collection! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag makes lunches fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's great quality and so much better than a ziplock bag. I love the fact that it can go through the dishwasher I would definitely buy another one (at sale price).
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spade

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much anything
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend really likes this bag. She uses it to pack for sandwiches, produce (celery, lettuce, berries), snacks (nuts/chips), and muffins. Pretty much anything. She's never had any leakage issues with the bag. It's really easy to clean and pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Abe22

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my favorite planet wise product. Unlike their wet bags, laundry bags, and other items, the snack bags are poorly made. I prefer Itzy Ritzy snack bags over these but all of their other products are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ali23

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for messy things like egg-salad sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for messy things like egg-salad sandwiches. It has a plastic liner which keeps things from leaking out. The only downside is the liner is a bit stiff so it's tough to turn inside-out for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Eric John Christeson

customer_reviews.title: Go green and buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awesome. We are huge on the environment and use of plastics. So we picked these up in order to replace zip lock bags. They keep food fresh and wash easy. We bought several of them for my family.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHague

customer_reviews.title: Probably was operator error, but the lining of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably was operator error, but the lining of this one (and I have 3 other patterns, all cleaned and dried the same) somewhat melted together during the first washing in the dishwasher (top rack, heat dry off).
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love my reusable bags! These are perfect for my lunches or to pack snacks on the go. They've held up very well and I love how much better I feel about packing lunches when I know I'm not creating more waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli K

customer_reviews.title: No more toss away plastic bags!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, reusable snack bags. They're big enough to hold a sandwich if necessary, but small enough to be considered "snack size" (rather than a typical wet bag size). They are "coated" on the inside, making them easy to wipe out, and the zipper closure keeps the contents securely inside until it's time for them to come out. Great alternative to using a gazillion toss away plastic bags!
customer_reviews.author: tlj260

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love Plant Wise and all their products. I've used their wet/dry bags mostly. I bought this bag to transport my LOs spoons to school. This bag is super cute, works great, is reusable, and washable!! It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CW23

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Super durable and don’t dry food out!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great for snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for snacks! So far, I've only used for dry snacks and grapes. I haven't had any issues with staleness (on dry snacks), although I typically pack snacks first thing in the morning and they're eaten by lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Easy to open and close. I wish they were cheaper so I could buy a ton of them, but I guess I'll have to wash them every day instead. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than buying plastic bags that get thrown away. So far it's held up really well. Plus, it's adorable. My daughter loves it. Will be buying more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindz03

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Not air tight, will leak fluid. Good for dry stuff, veggies (less fluid) and some fruits. Easily holds sandwiches. Will stain with some food. Hand wash only, air dry.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: These are great to keep from buying plastic bags😁 saves money and the environment! And they have great prints. I prefer the neutral prints. Planet Wise hasn't disappointed me badly yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this snack bag and so does my 11 year old. The zipper works well, and it is easy to clean. Design is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Visionary63

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my bread fresh
customer_reviews.text: We use these primarily for packing sandwiches and fruit. This bag has a plastic liner. It essentially is a plastic bag with a zipper with some cute patterned material over it. It's a bit of a pain to wash b/c turning it inside out and then being careful not to get the material wet, but it beats the "Bumpkins" brand that we tried that allows the bread to start going stale within 12 hours. We'll likely buy another one but a different brand to see what the difference could be. I love the zipper b/c crumbs don't get stuck in it like with the velcro type bags. Hope this review helps. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: GrayYellow892

customer_reviews.title: My favorite reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: Rounded interior corner make for no trapped crumbs when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: J. FORCUM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for small quantity of snacks! Love not using plastic bags!
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had a chance yet to actually use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance yet to actually use it, but can't wait. I'm trying to use less single use plastic and this will help.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to throw in the wash (inside out), and hang dry. My baby loves having a snack out of these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the zipper on these. They are much better than the velcro, but I did wish they came in the smaller snack size with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: February Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little reusable bag! I am definitely ordering more. Great for small dry snacks.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Useful.
customer_reviews.text: We love these. I use them for my kid's snacks as well as my own. These are awesome. We use these every day.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The functionality is great. I love that this is cute and still helps the environment.
customer_reviews.author: noelani

customer_reviews.title: A great snack bag
customer_reviews.text: A great snack bag! I love how cute this is and that it's reusable. With the lining it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ANON18

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these, BUT they do mold
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these, BUT they do mold. So I only use them now for dry stuff. No more fruit etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lafirira

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and totally functional
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and totally functional. I use this to hold everything from snacks to pens. Cleans easily with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for my daughter's lunch. Easy to just toss in the wash in a lingerie bag. Convenient.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: but I think it's a perfect storage solution if you are going to store something ...
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy the clear Planet wise for storage of cheese, meat, and leftovers in the fridge. The liner is a bit harder to turn inside out than our other bags, but I think it's a perfect storage solution if you are going to store something for a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: child.of.eve

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It is versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It is versatile, easy to care for and very cute. I will definitely be ordering more in various sizes.
customer_reviews.author: vonners

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags! They are incredibly durable and very easy to clean. Just purchased more!
customer_reviews.author: samiam46

customer_reviews.title: Good reusable bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is similar to some others in that it is double layered, with a decorative fabric cover and a food appropriate liner. This bag has been labeled food safe by the FDA. It is a good size for a cut-up apple or similar snack. The inner lining is rather stiff and doesn't bend as easily as some of the other bags out there, which is why I gave it 4 stars not 5, but that's just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: Great bag that fits big slices of bread!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like with this bag. It fits big slices of bread which is great. The owl pattern is nice and the zipper opens and closes easily. It washes well too!
customer_reviews.author: GGal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these bags. It keeps fruit fresher for snacks all day and none of the juice drips out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cashen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome keeps snacks in order and also beats using a glad bag everyday
customer_reviews.author: myrna

customer_reviews.title: High quality and lined snack pouch
customer_reviews.text: Great value and very durable! This is a nice pouch for my son to use for snacks at preschool. It’s lined so very easy to clean. Can’t wait to get more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to clean. Perfect size for a snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kuppy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a great size for sandwiches and easy to wash out. It is not air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Hollymac558

customer_reviews.title: ... water proof because of the zipper but they are great, I typically use them for carrots and things ...
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof because of the zipper but they are great, I typically use them for carrots and things like that
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for grapes or chips in lunch bags. I have washed them several times, they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. McKoy

customer_reviews.title: Reusable wins!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for my husbands lunches. Large enought to fit a sandwich and great for his snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Eco Friendly Mama

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations. A little pricey for what it is, but I will get use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased: -Sturdy -Vibrant colors -Cleanse easily with a damp clothe
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for smaller make up items because of the lining being waterproof material.
customer_reviews.author: just.believe

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this with the zipper. Generous size and so fits lots of food. Easy to clean as well. Want more.
customer_reviews.author: Dm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My daughter loves carrying her chips in this to school!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Phelps Parker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute but very hard to keep clean for sandwiches
customer_reviews.author: beck

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and she told me she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom and she loved the design. She used it for snacks in her lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Knikki

customer_reviews.title: ... stop using so many ziploc bags and it is super cute and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Helps me stop using so many ziploc bags and it is super cute and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: maria g mora

customer_reviews.title: Great Reusable Bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall great bag. Only concern is it gets dirty over time.
customer_reviews.author: Siite

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are great and easy to keep clean. They come in handy often!
customer_reviews.author: Loudles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my sandwich , keeps it very fresh ....
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E Martinek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good size - easy to wash not easy to dry
customer_reviews.author: Warren Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: The bag is functional (though not NEARLY as good quality as the Itzy Ritzy bags I bought)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ladybug pattern, and I wasn't thrilled with it. When it gets wet as you wash it (even the slightest splash of water on the outside), the red color from the ladybugs immediately bleeds into the white. The bag is functional (though not NEARLY as good quality as the Itzy Ritzy bags I bought), but I rarely use it because it's just more cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bag
customer_reviews.text: Definitely water proof. I've carried grapes without leakage! I've used it for over a month and it has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hbh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean but do not keep my snacks fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful snack bag
customer_reviews.text: Great snack bag for dry or wet snacks (cut up apples). There is a thick plastic lining inside. Quality construction. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ValueHunter

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, nice quality and a good price. I am happy to be able to support a domestic business.
customer_reviews.author: Bkworm78

customer_reviews.title: love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy zippers for my kids, made in the USA, very roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Planet Wise Reusable Zipper Sandwich and Snack Bags, Sandwich, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:SandwichReuseable sandwich bags from Planet Wise - now with zipper closure. Same patent-pending seam sealed sides and bottom so that no liquid escapes. FDA Food Safe material and stylish cotton outers.
feature_bullets: Made with FDA Food Safe EVA. It is PVC, BPA, Phthalate, Latex, and Lead Free!
The Planet Wise Reusable Zipper Sandwich and Snack Bags are great for storing more than food. Use for your keys, change, art supplies, put a damp cloth inside for on the go cleanup.
They can be hand washed in warm/hot water with dish soap, or machine wash them in cold water, and are also top-rack dishwasher safe! Air or towel dry. Microwave use is not recommended.
